link_desc:
Monitor Daikin airconditioners using the BRP072A42 WiFi module.

More information about the Daikin API here https://github.com/ael-code/daikin-control

This template allows you to monitor the following

  • Inside Temperature
  • Outside Temperature
  • Set Temperature
  • Compressor Load
  • Mode
  • Power on/off

You need to install the daikin.sh script in your externalscripts directory and ensure it is executable. The script uses curl to query the Daikin http API and extract the response
author: Wilson Waters
